scripts.copy-assets: cpx "node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" public/css/ && cpx "node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js" public/js/ && cpx "node_modules/animate.css/animate.min.css" public/css/ && cpx "node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css" public/css/ && cpx "node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/*" public/fonts/
